headline: Does the Recent 20% Drop Make Axon Enterprise a Good Value in 2025?
summary: Curious whether Axon Enterprise's stock really lives up to the hype? You’re not alone. This is the question on many investors’ minds right now. After an incredible multiyear run, gaining 221.3% over three years and 396.9% over the past five, the stock recently pulled back significantly, losing 20.5% in the last week and 17.8% over the past month. Recent headlines have centered on Axon's continued expansion into global law enforcement and new product launches, fueling both optimism and...
